Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Intestinal Diseases/Colonic Diseases/Colonic Diseases, Functional/Colonic Pseudo-Obstruction
Record.Description: Functional obstruction of the COLON leading to MEGACOLON in the absence of obvious COLONIC DISEASES or mechanical obstruction. When this condition is acquired, acute, and coexisting with another medical condition (trauma, surgery, serious injuries or illness, or medication), it is called Ogilvie's syndrome.
